website_summaries.verdict: A slim, compact, and affordable bottle opener that boasts outstanding strength and durability.
pros: Constructed from stainless steel for exceptional quality
Each end has a different opening shape that allows you to instantly open different types of bottles
cons: Magnet is very weak, which means the bottle opener is unlikely to stay attached to a metal surface

customer_reviews.title: Large & Useful!
customer_reviews.text: These bottle openers are AWESOME! I was glad to see these packaged as a set. I have been working at color coding my home, camping, beach, etc accessories and these colors fit perfectly! Red for my family's emergency vehicle supplies, green for my RV and blue for my beach outtings. There were only 2 colors missing (orange - for home use and black - for my personal vehicle). It was tiresome transporting one bottle opener for various reasons/outtings; they were small (easy to misplace) and just old, rusty and dull. These are large and colors vibrant! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: N Manley

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: These are huge. Twice as big as I thought they were gonna be. Makes them difficult to lose thou so that's good. Pop off bottle tops without any effort. I'd say they are great
customer_reviews.author: Lance P.

customer_reviews.title: Did I Say They Are BIG?
customer_reviews.text: Boy these fellows are big. They are strong enough I expect to open anything. Nice looking, very sturdy and pretty and anyone should like them unless they want something small because these are not small. I'm glad but was astonished by the size. I would definitely have bought them in a store for their quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Suzyrizzi

customer_reviews.title: speed openers rock!
customer_reviews.text: this is by far the easiest style beer bottle opener to use, will quickly and easily remove even the thickest cap. You get three colors for a bonus! no sharp burrs on any of the three I got. rubber coating seems thick and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Left Coast Geek

customer_reviews.title: Stunning, strong, and useful
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, great looking, and comfortable in the hand. Also, these bottle openers are weighty, and probably less likely to vanish than small lightweight church keys. They do have a large hole at one end that could be used to tether the bottle opener, or to mount it on a hook.
customer_reviews.author: B. Day

customer_reviews.title: Study, but GIANT!
customer_reviews.text: They are GIANT! Haha. Not exactly what I was expecting, but they are sturdy! I just use it to open my sparkling water, and it did the trick! I guess a good side of them being so large is it will be easy to find in the utensil drawer. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: kiggidykayla

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: They aren’t the prettiest bottle openers and honestly the have some small blemishes...BUT they work perfectly and they’re so big it’s almost impossible to lose them so a few blemishes are easy to overlook.
customer_reviews.author: S Wri

customer_reviews.title: It does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to store in back pocket. The rubber cover goes too far down though which causes some wear and tear to the rubber closest to the mouth. I ended up just cutting the rubber off because it got so torn up that it didn't look appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity Lindley

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why they think you need a 3 pack of these. I only needed one and I use it to open 35mm roll film canisters. Nicely made, good rubberized handle. You won’t break these.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nelxon

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted for opening sparkling cider for a large group!
customer_reviews.text: These bottle openers are attractive colors (red, green, blue), large so they won't be lost and work well! A great bargain, too.
customer_reviews.author: Evergreen

customer_reviews.title: Quality bottle openers for the price
customer_reviews.text: Quality heavy-duty construction. Deducted a star because of poor packaging (tapes all over place, hard to cut) and strong PVC smell. Other than that, the product seems fine at doing it's job.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Work
customer_reviews.text: They get the job done, bright color’s make them easy to find when people drop them in the lawn. And oh yeah they open bottles which is the whole point

customer_reviews.title: A very nice bottle opener
customer_reviews.text: I like these, exactly what I was anticipating, sturdy strong and I like the plastic dip.

customer_reviews.title: Feels built to last

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.author: HowenDay

customer_reviews.title: They open bottles
customer_reviews.text: They're big, they're cheap, they work. For years I've used the bottle opener on the end of my can opener's handle, but it was slipping off the edges of some of the tighter caps more and more often. Enough bottle caps (both beer and soda) get opened in my kitchen that I decided it was time to get something better. These seem to do the job just fine. At first they're a little big for smaller hands, but you just need to get used to how to hold it because it doesn't take much force to open most bottles with an opener this long.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Heironimus

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but too long, wide and non magnetic
customer_reviews.text: Got these today, and opened the first beer bottle. Nice job easy. 2 minor annoyances. 1- they r gigantic!! 7 inches long and very wide (more than an inc and half). Not ergonomically correct. If u occasionally use them, no big deal. 2- the fine print says they r not magnetic!! U can’t attach them to your fridge door. Colors r pretty , though.
customer_reviews.author: S Koy

customer_reviews.title: A bit bigger than I realized but it works great
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, happy. My mistake for not really looking at the DIMENSIONS of these bottle openers. Just a lot larger than I thought, but that's my fault for not reading that myself. Still works fine for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: N. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Nice bottle openers.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I needed a few more for a beer judging competition. These bottle openers worked fine and the vinyl is nice and tight around the body. They were much better than the combo bottle opener/corkscrews I had.
customer_reviews.author: snarf

customer_reviews.title: Hagrid’s Bottle Openers
customer_reviews.text: If you’re a big beer or soda drinker, these are great! I don’t necessarily mean you drink a lot, i mean if you drink BIG bottles. The openers are ginormous! I like them, they do what they’re supposed to do, but if you’ve got small hands these aren’t for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sean B.

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected, but work fine
customer_reviews.text: Why have I been scraping up my fingers all these years whenever I hit a difficult twist-off cap, or accidentally trying to twist off a cap that's not a twist-off (I'm looking at you Stella). These look and work great, though they will probably be larger and heavier than you expect them to be.
customer_reviews.author: Bob R.

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors...
customer_reviews.text: We keep this in the cooler we take on the boat and on the golf cart. We like the heftiness and the brightness of if so we don’t lose it. It opens bottles what more can I say.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic. Excellent quality and they do what they're supposed ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. Excellent quality and they do what they're supposed to do! I was a bit surprised that they were as big as they are but that's my fault for not paying more attention to the dimensions when I ordered them. The rubber grip works well and the colors are vibrant, they're easy to find in the drawer and hard to lose in general :)
customer_reviews.author: MMB

customer_reviews.title: Will probably last for generations
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy metal that unless you are going to try and pry up nails, will probably last for generations. For opening bottles, these are far more sturdy than you will ever need. Buy these and you will probably be set for life.... and beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Billy B

customer_reviews.title: Wrong colors but good product
customer_reviews.text: These bottle openers really are heavy duty and I suspect they will last a long time while not taking up much space. Unfortunately, the color you select is not necessarily the color you will receive. I like the red, blue and green ones, but I got completely different colors. Otherwise, I think it's a good product, particularly if you don't care at all about the colors.
customer_reviews.author: MyHomeZoo

customer_reviews.title: Being almost 80 years old and a bartender isn't easy but anything that helps him is worth it and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what my dad with arthritis needed. He's owned a bar in a small town for over 39 years. Being almost 80 years old and a bartender isn't easy but anything that helps him is worth it and this product is one of those things!
customer_reviews.author: Blanca D.

customer_reviews.title: Not a huge deal but doesn’t look the best, if not for that would be 5

Hopefully the rubber handles stay on and do not slide over time. Not a huge deal but doesn’t look the best, if not for that would be 5 stars

product_meta.title: HQY 3 Pack Heavy Duty Stainless Steel Flat Bottle Opener, Solid Easy to Use Best Bottle Openers, 7 inches Red, Green, Blue
product_meta.description: Color:FlatRed&Green&BlueThese hand-held flat bottle openers are made of stainless steel, making them durable enough to keep the tops popping off for years to come. This tool is easy to handle and precisely the right tool for the job. Each opening end is a different shape to accommodate various types of bottles.
feature_bullets: Great for professional bartenders or home use.
Top quality.Each measures approx. 7" long x 1.5" wide.

100% MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY: We stand behind our products with a complete, lifetime guarantee. If something breaks or if you don't absolutely love your Heavy Duty Bottle Opener, we will take it back and offer a replacement or refund, no questions asked. That is part of our 100% LIFETIME CUSTOMER SATISFACTION GUARANTEE!!!
